summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the description for galleryImages id '1' (title 'Pink Dreams') in frontend/src/content/siteConfig.ts to the exact requested string. However, two additional files were modified that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/generated frontend-file-summaries.txt content (documentation/metadata) despite request only asking to change the gallery card description text in siteConfig.ts.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requests updating a specific description string in frontend/src/content/siteConfig.ts and explicitly constrains changes to only the selected element/content.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json (project metadata/state) despite request only asking to change the gallery card description text in siteConfig.ts.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any changes to project tracking/state files; constraint says do not modify other content beyond the selected element.
